# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic placement.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: ContentMarginPlacement { get }
```

## Discussion

Views that support margin customization can automatically use margins with this placement. For example, a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ScrollView] will use this placement to automatically inset both its content and scroll indicators by the specified amount.

## Getting the placement

- **scrollContent**: The scroll content placement.
- **scrollIndicators**: The scroll indicators placement.
